ERROR.NOT_A_SQUARE: The height of the Sudoku has to equal its width.
ERROR.INVALID_NUMBERS: All numbers have to be ≥ 1 and ≤ {{limit}}.

UNSUPPORTED.NOT_QUADRATIC: Sudokus of this size are not supported.

MAX.TOOLTIP: Maximum steps which the solver executes before it terminates. This prevents an infinite-loop, if no solution is found.

STEP.CLEANUP_POSSIBLE_VALUES: Remove found values from possible values
STEP.EMPTY_CELLS_TO_POSSIBLE_VALUES: Determine possible values in empty cells
STEP.SINGLE_POSSIBLE_VALUE: Convert cells where only one value is possible
STEP.VALUES_POSSIBLE_ONCE: Search for values which are possible only once
STEP.ELIMINATE_FROM_SQUARE: Eliminate values in squares which are possible only in one row/column of that square
STEP.ELIMINATE_FROM_ROW_OR_COLUMN: Eliminate values in rows/columns which are possible only in one square-section of that row/column
STEP.ELIMINATE_POSSIBLE_PAIR_FROM_OTHER_CELLS: Eliminate pairs, which are possible only twice, from other cells
STEP.ELIMINATE_OTHER_VALUES_FROM_POSSIBLE_PAI: Eliminate other possible values from pairs, which are possible only twice
STEP.BRANCH_CLOSE: Close current branch because it became invalid
STEP.BRANCH_OPEN: Open new branch because no progress was made during this step
STEP.ELIMINATE_OTHER_VALUES_FROM_POSSIBLE_MUL: Eliminate other possible values from combinations, which are possible only in certain cells

PAUSE_AT_STEP.LABEL: Pause at step
PAUSE_AT_STEP.TOOLTIP: Pauses the solver when the specified step is reached.

DELAY.TOOLTIP: Waiting time in milliseconds between steps while solving the Sudoku

NUMBER.LABEL: Highlight number
NUMBER.TOOLTIP: Highlights all occurrences of this number in the Sudoku.

ADDITIONAL.TITLE: State before the new branch was created

HINTS.TITLE: Usage hints
HINTS.USE_KEYBOARD: You can enter values by clicking on a cell and typing on the keyboard.
HINTS.ENTER_VALUES: Enter the known values of the sudoku.
HINTS.SET_SIZE: Select the size of the sudoku you want to solve.
HINTS.CONTINUE_TO_SOLVER: Press the button "{{buttonName}}" when you are done.
HINTS.CHANGE_PUZZLE: Press the button "{{buttonName}}" to go back to change your input.
HINTS.ACTION_BUTTONS: Use the buttons in section "{{name}}" to control the solver (start, pause, etc).
HINTS.SEE_CHANGES: The changes from the last step are visible by hovering over the highlighted cells.
